fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Outlines entitlements and procedures for claiming paid sick leave, ensuring fairness and accountability.

fields.label: Sick Leave Entitlements
options: 1 day for every 26 days worked during first 6 months
30 days paid sick leave over 3 years after 6 months employment

fields.label: Notification of Absence
options: Failure to notify may result in unpaid leave

fields.label: Medical Certificate Requirements
options: Required for absences >2 days or >2 occasions in 8 weeks
Failure to provide may result in disciplinary action
Certificate must be provided from 3rd day of absence

fields.label: Disciplinary Actions
options: Failure to provide medical certificate when required
Failure to notify management of absence
Absence without valid reason may lead to warning or action
